title: Augmenting Duffl's Restock Process
description: How might we harness technology to optimize the efficiency of our supply chain processes? Read about my experience designing and developing custom full-stack software to alleviate the growing pains of a $30M delivery startup.

title: System Design Capstone
alt: graphic depicting computer servers on the cloud
description: What does it take to generate and insert ten million data points into a database efficiently? What strategies can we implement to handle thousands of user requests per second on our service?
